original_title: 貞操帯の女28 七瀬いおり
overview: Sakura Hojo, a management consultant who was headhunted by a Japanese planning company from a top American company. ... and that's the face of the story. Miyako, the director of the planning company, pulled out the cherry blossoms to meet the request of her big client, Hirumuma. Hirunuma, who sneaked into the company as a chore clerk according to his own scenario, made Sakura his own and played with it day and night.
title: Chastity Belt Girl 28 – Iori Nanase
